page.title: 05EASTHAM LOCKS.
page.content: Eastham Locks was built in May 1891. Manchester ship canal starts by Eastham Locks.The canal has to have tidal locks and there are some at Eastham.They have to be open at high water so that they will hold all the water that comes in.At Eastham the canal begins with,first the dredged canal and the entrance look to the Queen Elizabeth II dock on the right and the Eastham Locks ahead.The Manchester ship canal was opened in 1894 so Eastham locks was probably opened then too.The main forms of { {transport }along the canal are small oil and gas tankers,small container ships,barges and tugs.
